name: Amber Oud
description: Amber Oud captures the essence of eternal summer. Zesty citrus bursts into a cascade of ripe fruits — an intoxicating dance of sweetness and light. As the day fades, velvety vanilla, white musk, and amber weave a silken trail of warmth and allure. A fragrance of pure joy and sensual sophistication —vibrant, long-lasting, and irresistibly magnetic.

name: Pure Oud Royale
description: 100% pure agarwood oil from the finest sources. Uncut, authentic, and rare.

name: Mystic Blend
description: A mysterious fusion of oud, sandalwood, and exotic spices. Captivating and timeless.

name: Saffron Oud
description: Golden saffron threads intertwined with rich oud. Opulent and refined.

name: Cambodian Oud
description: Rare Cambodian agarwood with deep, complex notes. For true connoisseurs.

name: Rose Oud
description: Delicate rose petals meet earthy oud. A perfect harmony of floral and woody.
